free_text.Prérequis: Basic knowledge of physics, mechanics of materials, mathematics
free_text.Bibliographie et matériel: No textbook required. Lecture notes will be distributed before each lecture.
free_text.Forme d'enseignement: The material is presented by lectures and visits to the laboratory. Student evaluation is based on class participation and presentation of a project.
free_text.Contenu: 1. Introduction-Basic ideas about the use of composite materials, fibers, resins, applications [br/] 2. Manufacturing of composite materials-composite components [br/] 3. Basic mechanics of composites-Anisotropic theory of elasticity [br/] 4. Mechanics of laminates [br/] 5. Classical lamination theory [br/] 6. Introduction to structural design [br/] 7. Laboratory experience: Fabrication and testing of laminates [br/] 8. Failure of FRP laminates [br/] 9. Fatigue of composite materials [br/]10. Joints and joining techniques
free_text.Objectifs d'apprentissage: 1. Introduce topics in properties, processing, mechanical behavior, characterization, analysis and structural design of Fiber Reinforced Composites [br/]2. Help students develop their research skills through independent investigations on research topics
